title: The Warrior Trilogy (White Lion’s Lady, Black Lion’s Bride, Lady of Valor)
description: Dark, dangerous knights. Bold, beautiful ladies. Passionate, romantic adventure. Get swept away in this boxed collection of three full-length, award-winning romances by New York Times and #1 internationally best-selling author Lara Adrian!WHITE LION'S LADYA dangerous knight on a rogue's mission, Griffin of Droghallow is forced to confront his tarnished honor when the heiress he is hired to abduct turns out to be Isabel de Lamere, the virtuous beauty who once adored him.BLACK LION'S BRIDEDark and dangerous Sebastian of Montborne, a warrior on crusade in the Holy Land, meets his match in Zahirah, an exotic beauty on a secret, deadly mission--one that will put Sebastian’s honor on the line, forcing him to choose between king and country, or the enemy he cannot resist. LADY OF VALORWidowed by the Crusades, Emmalyn of Fallonmour is determined to control her own destiny, even if she must defy a dangerous warrior known in battle as Blackheart -- the man sent to guard her castle on the order of the king. (Titles also available individually in ebook and paperback editions. Audiobook editions forthcoming.)
author: Tina St. John
